statements: UPDATE inventory_levels SET current_stock = 50, reorder_point = 20 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_levels SET product_name = 'New Product Name', current_stock = 100 WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE inventory_levels SET current_stock = current_stock + 10, reorder_point = reorder_point - 5 WHERE product_id = 100
UPDATE inventory_levels SET product_name = 'New Product Name', current_stock = 50 WHERE product_id = 200
UPDATE inventory SET current_stock = 50 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE stockouts SET reason = 'Damaged product' WHERE stockout_id = 3;
UPDATE inventory SET current_stock = current_stock + 10, max_stock = max_stock * 2 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE stockouts SET stockout_date = '2022-12-31', reason = 'Overstock issue' WHERE stockout_id = 202;
UPDATE inventory_items SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE supply_orders SET order_date = '2022-01-15', delivery_date = '2022-01-20' WHERE order_id = 5;
UPDATE inventory_items SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE item_id = 5;
UPDATE supply_orders SET quantity_ordered = quantity_ordered + 10, delivery_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE order_id = 100;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_person = 'John Doe', contact_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE supplier_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity + 10, location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE orders SET quantity = quantity - 5 WHERE order_id = 101;
UPDATE InventoryLevel SET quantity = 20, location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE InventoryLevel SET location = 'Warehouse B', quantity = 15 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE InventoryLevel SET quantity = 100, last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = 1
UPDATE InventoryLevel SET location = 'Warehouse A', quantity = 75 WHERE product_name = 'Product X'
